rules.label: Sales Accepted process and Owner Division has changed

Flow.description: #SFAE-214 - Added nodes to update PushCount and SDR Push Count Values

formulas.description: Returns true if Close Date Month/Year is pushed ahead. This logic was migrated from the Opportunity Trigger.
formulas.name: CheckCloseDateUpdate
formulas.expression: IF(({!$Record.CloseDate} > {!$Record__Prior.CloseDate}), OR(Month({!$Record.CloseDate})> Month({!$Record__Prior.CloseDate}), YEAR({!$Record.CloseDate})> YEAR({!$Record__Prior.CloseDate})), false)

formulas.description: Returns true if Expected_Ready_for_Sales_Date__c Month/Year is pushed ahead
formulas.name: CheckExpectedReadyForSalesDateUpdate

formulas.description: Populates the trim of the first 255 characters from the description field.
formulas.name: TrimDescriptionSummary

Flow.label: Opportunity - BEFORE Save
